profile.name: Mitchell Hashimoto
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Fortinet | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong background in systems programming, language development, and open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed multiple high-performance software components for Fortinet's security solutions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate new features and improve overall system efficiency.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for software development, testing, and deployment.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients in the finance, healthcare, and e-commerce industries.
Contributed to open-source projects such as ghostty-org/ghostty, providing bug fixes and feature enhancements.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Identified and fixed bugs in the ghostty project, including OutOfSpace issues.
Implemented fixes and enhancements as per community feedback.

experience.title: Contributor
description: Contribution to the Zig compiler, including language bindings and feature implementations.

points: Understanding of memory allocation and deallocation techniques.
Experience with memory management libraries such as malloc and free.
Knowledge of language design principles and syntax.
Experience with compiler development and language bindings.
